title: Image Preview
content: Thanks liwenyip hugo easy gallery   Zebradil   Pull Request  48   Now  use      shortcode hugo theme jane  Normal Image image static image folder       shortcode figure image title      figure image caption           shortcode usage Specifying image files       will use thumb jpg thumbnail image jpg lightbox           will use image jpg thumbnail lightbox      will use image small jpg thumbnail image jpg lightbox Optional parameters  features parameters Hugo s built in figure shortcode work normal  i e  src  link  title  caption  class  attr  attribution   attrlink  alt size  e g  size  1024x768   pre defines image size PhotoSwipe  Use option don t want pre load linked image determine its size  class allows set custom classes want    tag  Optional parameters standalone      shortcodes  i e  don t use      inside        strange things may happen do   caption position caption effect work      shortcode  see below   width defines max width image displayed page  using thumbnail standalone figure  set equal thumbnail s native width captions behave properly  or feel free better solution submit pull request       use option don t thumbnail don t want hi res image entire width screen container  class  no photoswipe  prevents    loaded PhotoSwipe  click figure you ll instead good ol  fashioned hyperlink bigger image  or   haven t specified bigger image   one        shortcode simple gallery specify directory image files       images automatically captioned file name   image  jpg used hi res image   image  thumb jpg used thumbnails   image  thumb jpg doesn t exist   image  jpg will used hi res thumbnail images  default thumbnail suffix  thumb  specify different one e g  thumb   small  thumb  _150x150   specify individual image files                          Optional parameters  caption position   determines captions  position image  Options  bottom  default  center none hides captions page  they will show PhotoSwipe  caption effect   determines if how captions appear upon hover  Options  slide  default  fade none  captions always visible  hover effect   determines if how images change upon hover  Options  zoom  default  grow shrink slideup slidedown none hover transition   determines if how images change upon hover  Options  not set   smooth transition  default  none   hard transition

title: Shortcodes Preview
content: Shortcode Hugo loves Markdown its simple content format  times when Markdown falls short  Often  content authors forced add raw HTML  e g   video     Markdown content  think contradicts beautiful simplicity Markdown s syntax  Hugo created shortcodes circumvent limitations  shortcode simple snippet inside content file Hugo will render using predefined template  Note shortcodes will not work template files  need type drop in functionality shortcodes provide template  likely want partial template instead  addition cleaner Markdown  shortcodes updated time reflect new classes  techniques  standards  point site generation  Hugo shortcodes will easily merge changes  avoid possibly complicated search replace operation  details  https   gohugo io content management shortcodes
